name: Mirab with Sails Unfurled
description:
You and Benderite Games at GMTK gamejam!

Engines at full. The beast at Tanagra. 

MwSU on the ocean.

Dodging asteroids until Shaka, when the walls fell.

Challenge to Kiazi's children, their faces wet.

Benderite Games, his arms wide :-)

English: This game is for the GMTK gamejam (Out of Control). Your engines are stuck on full throttle causing you to increase in speed indefinitely. This is a single player game, so dodge asteroids as long as you can until you fall to the challenge.

It's free so give it a try!!!
